name: Battle Against a True Hero - Just Shapes and Beats Edition
name_original: Battle Against a True Hero - Just Shapes and Beats Edition
description:
Use the ASDW or arrow keys to move!  Can you dodge Undyne's fierce spear barrage?

*** DISCLAIMER: I DO NOT OWN THE CHARACTERS OR MUSIC IN THIS GAME ***

The characters and music in this game are the invention of a game designer named Toby Fox, who created the game where these characters and soundtracks appear: "Undertale".  I created this as a fan game based on his original work.

Undertale game: https://undertale.com/
